description:
The mmg app is an electronic wallet, the first in Guyana, which uses a secure platform to allow you more money flexibility. It’s speedy, secure, simple and has no monthly fees. Using mmg, you can make payments, shop, transfer money, top up your phone, and more. You can do it anytime, anywhere.

Our agents are conveniently located so you can top up your account with ease. Download now to get started.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Stay on top of your business with MMG Agent and Merchant App. Process transactions on the go, track performance in real time, and manage your growth with ease. 

The MMG Agents and Merchants App allows you to stay on top of your business by giving you the tools to manage your business in the palm of your hand. Whether you’re processing customer payments, tracking sales, or reviewing your performance, the app makes it simple and convenient to stay in control.

With this app, you can:
      •     Process transactions anytime, anywhere – no need to rely on a desktop or in-store system.
      •     Track your sales and transactions in real time –  monitor your performance on the go.
      •     Gain insights into your business growth – review performance dashboards and keep on top of your goals.
      •     Enjoy a secure, reliable mobile experience – built on MMG’s trusted platform.

Stay connected, stay efficient, and stay ahead with our Agent & Merchant App - your mobile companion for smarter business management.

RepublicMobile is a Banking Application owned by Republic Bank (Guyana) Limited.
Available 24/7 on multiple devices, RepublicMobile makes banking easier as you can now do banking wherever you are, whenever you want, in real time.
You can use RepublicMobile to:
View
• Account balances
• Transaction history
• eStatements
Conduct
• Transfers between persona, third party Republic Bank and Other Bank accounts
• Cardless Cash transactions
• Real time credit card payments
• Pay your Loans 
• Bill/Utility payments, using your Republic Bank accounts or credit cards
RepublicMobile Guyana is made available to both Personal and Corporate Customers
Anyone can download the app and view the Public Page to see our Benefits, News and locate branches.  To log on to the RepublicMobile Guyana you need to be an Internet Banking customer

developer: Guyana Bank for Trade and Industry Ltd
description:
GBTI Mobile is available 24/7 on Apple devices.  GBTI Mobile caters to your banking needs wherever you are.

Don't let work life keep you back. Travel, relax and chill. GBTI Mobile be right there with you.



Here’s what you can do with your Mobile App:

View

Account balances
Transaction history
e-Statements
Execute

Transfers between personal and third party GBTI accounts
Peer To Peer Transfers
Wire Transfers
Cardless Cash transactions such as Merchant Payments
Loans Payments
Bill/utility payments
New Term Deposit
Initiate

Service Requests for various Account Statements
Goals to save towards


GBTI Mobile is available to both Personal and Corporate Customers.

Anyone can download the app and view the Public Page and learn more about our products, News and locate branches. 

To log on to the GBTI Mobile you must be a GO Banking user.

Unlock the world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading with Bybit

Join 78 million users to experience seamless, secure and reliable cryptocurrency trading. Trade, manage and grow your Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency portfolio today with our simple and innovative platform. No matter if you're a beginner or a professional, or eyeing Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) or other major cryptocurrencies, we're here to make your trading seamless, secure and reliable.

Bitcoin and crypto trading simplified
Our mission is to simplify the purchase of popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), Polkadot (DOT), PEPE. Mantle (MNT), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE) and Hedera (HBAR). Trade Spot and Derivatives pairs easily with fiat or cryptocurrency, including BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT and XRPUSDT contracts.

Our trading features
- Derivatives trading: Trade Perpetuals, Futures and Options seamlessly with advanced risk management tools.
- Spot trading: Enjoy features like Take Profit/Stop Loss (TP/SL) to maximize your trading efficiency. 
- Easy trade: Capture opportunities in the fast-moving Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency market with ease.
- Large trades & positions tracking: Track large Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency trades with real-time updates. 
- Bybit Card: Spend your Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT), USDT and other cryptos at millions of merchants worldwide online and in-store to earn up to 10% cashback in crypto.
- Bybit Pay: Send or spend Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and other crypto instantly—with zero gas fees and fast, secure settlement.
- Bybit Alpha: Seamless entry into the world of on-chain trading—bridging Bybit users to DeFi, NFTs and dApps through a fully integrated Web3 ecosystem.
- Bybit asset management: Build your portfolio with tools like Bybit Savings and Liquidity Mining and maximize your gains from Bitcoin (BTC) to newly-listed cryptocurrencies. 
- Copy Trading: Follow expert traders and apply their strategies in your Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency trades. 
- Bybit NFT Marketplace: Buy, sell or trade NFTs with ease in an expanding marketplace.

Why choose Bybit for your Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trades?

Instant crypto trading
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) PEPE and other crytpocurrencies instantly using credit cards, bank transfers or other payment methods.

Optimized experience
Our streamlined UX for Spot and Derivatives trading makes trading Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and other cryptocurrencies easier than ever.

Seamless deposits and transfers
Transfer major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and Ripples (XRP) quickly across multiple wallets with full customization options.

Portfolio diversification
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT), PEPE and other cryptocurrencies on Spot or Derivatives markets, with leveraged tokens, crypto loans and margin trading on offer.

Our official channels
Bybit Announcement Center: https://announcement.bybit.com
Bybit Blog: https://blog.bybit.com/en-us 
Bybit Learn: https://learn.bybit.com Bybit Help: https://bybit.com/en/help-center

Join our community
X: https://twitter.com/Bybit_Official 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bybit/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bybit_official/ 
Telegram: https://t.me/BybitEnglish

Complete your everyday transactions with more ease, accessibility, and security — for banking that’s as flexible as it is fast.   
 
Key features include: 
  
Budgeting, insights, and advice 
Create a budget and reach your financial goals faster with personalized insights and advice from Scotia Smart Money by Advice+.  
 
Rewards your way
View your Scene+ points balance and redeem your rewards right in the app. 
     
Mobile cheque deposit 
Take a photo of a cheque and deposit money quickly and easily into your account. 
 
TransUnion credit score and report 
Check your credit score with TransUnion as often as you want, at no additional cost and zero impact to your score. 
 
Barrier-free banking 
With features such as dynamic font sizing and VoiceOver compatibility, the app was designed with accessibility top of mind. 
  
Advisor access  
Book an appointment to meet with a Scotiabank advisor on the phone or in-person. 

Next-level security  
Data encryption keeps financial information safer, 2-step verification confirms your identity, and notifications help you stay on top of what’s happening in your accounts.   
 
Switch between Scotiabank apps 
Sign in once and navigate easily between the Scotia mobile banking app and the Scotia iTRADE app. 
 
Personalized support 
Find quick answers with the Scotiabank chatbot, and connect with a live chat advisor.

 
Important disclosures

By pressing the button above or by downloading the mobile app published by Scotiabank, you consent to the installation of this app and to future updates and upgrades. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting this app, or get instructions on how to remove or disable the Scotiabank mobile app by contacting us at the address below.


The Scotiabank mobile app lets you manage, move, and monitor your money using your mobile phone.


When you use Scotiabank’s mobile deposit feature, we will access your device camera to take a picture of your cheque; record the cheque number, account number, institution transit number, and amount; record your device model, as well as its iOS version and manufacturer.


When you download or update this app, or when you apply for, enrol in, or use a service through mobile banking, we may collect information about your computer or device, operating system, internet connection or telephone account, settings, IP address and device locational data, and transaction data, as well as personal information.


We may collect, use, disclose, and retain this information as set out in the Scotiabank Privacy Agreement (scotiabank.com/ca/en/about/contact-us/privacy/privacy-agreement.html) and to determine which settings are appropriate for your computer system, to provide or enhance digital functionality and banking options, and for security purposes, internal analysis, and reporting.


Please note that this app gives you access to Scotiabank accounts held in Canada. For information about our services in other countries, visit scotiabank.com.


Have questions about the app?

Visit scotiabank.com/app or give us a call at 1-877-277-9303 (Canada/USA) so we can help.


The Bank of Nova Scotia

44 King St. West

Toronto, ON M5H 1H1

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Scotiabank is more colourful than ever with a whole new look and logo. The first time you sign in to the new app, you'll need your ScotiaCard number and your password.

Please note that this app gives you access to Scotiabank accounts held in the following countries: Dominican Republic, Bahamas, Barbados, Jamaica, Trinidad and Tobago, Turks and Caicos Islands, and Cayman Islands. For information about our services in other countries, visit www.scotiabank.com.

Serious about your security
Your money is protected by multiple layers of security. Data encryption keeps your financial information safe, multi-factor authentication verifies your identity, and notifications keep you aware of your transactions.

Move your money faster
You can complete transfers between your accounts or to others with just a swipe.
You can add or delete your transfer recipients.

Pay your bills easily
You can add or delete bill payees, and pay your bill in a few simple steps.
Add/Delete third party transfer recipients.
Update your contact information.
Download account statements.
Download and share receipts for your bill payments and third party transfers.

Find the answers you need
With a menu at your fingertips and a fully searchable help section, the app has the answers you need and the shortcuts to take you there.


Barrier-free banking
From dynamic font sizing to VoiceOver compatibility, the new app was designed with everyone in mind.


With our app you can:
- Enrol in mobile banking if you haven't yet
- Use fingerprint or Face ID for fast and secure access
- Create a Username
- View accounts and transactions
- Transfer money between your accounts, to other Scotiabank customers, or to your friends and family at another bank
- Pay bills or top up your mobile phone
- Manage your Scotiabank Alerts
- Lock and control your credit cards
- Get answers to common questions around banking
- Send us your feedback

Important
By pressing the button above or by downloading the mobile app published by Scotiabank, you consent to the installation of this app and to future updates and upgrades. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting this app, or get instructions on how to remove or disable the Scotiabank mobile app by contacting us at the address below.


The Scotiabank mobile app lets you manage, move, and monitor your money using your mobile phone.

When you download or update this app, or when you apply for, enrol in, or use a service through mobile banking, we may collect information about your computer or device, operating system, internet connection or telephone account, settings, IP address and device locational data, and transaction data, as well as personal information.

We may collect, use, disclose, and retain this information as set out in the Scotiabank Privacy Agreement (https://jm.scotiabank.com/about-scotiabank/connect-with-scotiabank/privacy.html) and to determine which settings are appropriate for your computer system, to provide or enhance digital functionality and banking options, and for security purposes, internal analysis, and reporting.

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Take Control of Your Global Payments with Payoneer

Manage your business payments from anywhere with Payoneer, the ultimate platform for global payment solutions. Tailored for small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs), corporate entities, and entrepreneurs, Payoneer makes international money transfers and online payment processing seamless, secure, and cost-effective.

Why Choose Payoneer?

Receive Payments Globally.
Effortlessly send money overseas or receive payments in popular currencies like USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, and more. With Payoneer, you’ll gain access to international payment gateway solutions specifically designed for SMBs. Withdraw funds to your local business bank account in over 150 countries or access them instantly using your Payoneer card.

Simplify Payments for Businesses
Whether you’re paying service providers, suppliers, or contractors, Payoneer’s payment solutions ensure smooth, reliable transactions in over 200 countries. Enjoy fast and affordable digital payment options that help you avoid high fees and delays—allowing your business to operate efficiently.
Manage Finances with Ease

Track and control your finances on the go. 
From monitoring payments to managing balances across multiple currencies, Payoneer provides tools that enhance your financial flexibility and reliability. Competitive currency conversion rates empower you to pay suppliers in their preferred currencies while maximizing your cost savings.
Expand Your Business with Confidence

Leverage seller-specific features like VAT payments in multiple countries and working capital offers for platforms like Amazon and Walmart. Easily scale your business with immediate access to funds while ensuring ongoing cash flow efficiency.

Why Download the Payoneer App?
The Payoneer app makes managing your global payment solutions more convenient than ever. Oversee international money transfers and monitor payment solutions directly from your smartphone, bringing flexibility to your financial operations.

Reliable Customer Support
Our multilingual team is available 24/7 to assist with your digital payment solutions in over 20 languages. Whether you’re troubleshooting or have questions, we’re always just a click away.

Get Started Today
Join millions of businesses worldwide already using Payoneer to simplify their international money transfers and enhance their growth. Download the app now to unlock the power of a truly efficient global payment platform!

We’ve made it easier for you to manage your Western Union transfers with the Western Union: Self Service app. 

If you need to request money from a friend or family member, track a transfer, redirect an incoming transfer to your bank account, or find a nearby Western Union agent location – we have you covered. 

 

Key features: 


• Request money from your sender 
Do you need extra money? Now you can make money requests from senders in multiple countries whenever you need it. With the Western Union: Self Service app, requesting money has never been easier. 

• Track a money transfer 
To track your money transfer in real time, enter the tracking number (MTCN) and get the real-time status of your money. 

• Redirect transfers 
You can redirect any cash transfer to your bank account for fast and secure access to your funds. 

• Find a Western Union agent location 
Your app can also help you find a nearby Western Union agent location in just a few taps. Remember that our Western Union agent locations are independent businesses providing our money transfer services to our customers. 

• Get in touch with us 

No matter what questions or concerns you may have, we’re here for you. You can also get in touch by visiting a nearby Western Union agent location. 

 


With the Western Union: Self Service app, you can now change the way you receive money in Morocco and the Philippines! 




Services may be provided by Western Union Financial Services, Inc. NMLS# 906983 and/or Western Union International Services, LLC NMLS# 906985. See terms and conditions for details. Certain features may not be available to or from all countries and are subject to change. Learn more in the Western Union: Self Service app. 

The information transmitted, including any content in this communication, is confidential, intended only for the use of the intended recipient, and is the property of the Western Union Company or its affiliates and subsidiaries. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any use of the information contained in or transmitted with this communication, or dissemination, distribution, or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify the Western Union sender immediately by replying to this message and delete the original message.

Virtual cards, real control. Customize your design, set spending limits, and shop securely online or in-store.
Access 3,000+ stocks, ETFs, crypto and more-all in one secure platform.
Crypto, simplified. Buy & sell directly from your AED account-no detours, no delays.

Security that works for you. Set controls on where and how you spend, backed by powerful encryption.

Coinbase Wallet is now Base — with a new experience coming soon. One place to create, trade, and earn with the entire global onchain community. You can continue using the same Coinbase Wallet features in Base.

Base is your home for exploring crypto and the onchain ecosystem. Base is a secure onchain wallet and browser that puts you in control of your crypto, NFTs, DeFi activity, and digital assets.

SUPPORTED ASSETS
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), USD Coin (USDC), Avalanche (AVAX), Polygon (MATIC), BNB Chain (BNB), Optimism (OP), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE) and all Ethereum-compatible chains.

Welcome to the world of crypto
• Base is your gateway onchain: earn monthly rewards by holding USDC onchain, earn yield with DeFi, collect NFTs, join a DAO, and more
• Easily go from cash to crypto with more ways to pay • Stay up to date on the latest trends, including major price movements, top coins, trending assets & more
• Available in 25 languages and >170 countries, so you can say “hello” to onchain in your preferred language

*NEW* Earn rewards with USDC*
Stablecoin rewards: Eligible Base users can earn up to 4.1% APY just by holding USDC in your wallet. This means your funds remain liquid, accessible anytime.

Support for millions of tokens and a whole world of onchain apps
• Access an ever-growing list of tokens and decentralized apps
• Securely store, send and receive Bitcoin (BTC) and Ether (ETH), popular assets like Litecoin (LTC), and all ERC-20 tokens
• NFTs that you own are automatically added to your wallet

Industry-leading security
• Base keeps your crypto and data safe so you can explore the decentralized web with confidence
•  Support for cloud backups of passkeys and your recovery phrase help you avoid losing your assets if you lose your device or misplace your recovery phrase
• Additional security features help protect you from malicious sites and phishing scams

It’s our mission to bring the best of the onchain ecosystem to as many people as possible.
--
*USDC Rewards are offered at Coinbase’s discretion. You can opt out at any time. The rewards rate is subject to change and can vary by region. Customers will be able to see the latest applicable rates directly within their wallets if eligible. 

**Returns aren’t guaranteed. While loans are backed by collateral, there are still risks.
Find us on X and Farcaster: @CoinbaseWallet

Experience the all-in-one crypto wallet that makes buying, selling, swapping and sending digital assets simple—while letting you explore NFTs, DeFi and Meme coins. Whether you’re new to crypto or a seasoned trader, Blockchain.com allows you to buy crypto with a card, ApplePay or bank account and self-custody with industry-leading security at your fingertips.

EASY FOR BEGINNERS

- Buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and more with your bank card
- Simple user interface and clear instructions
- Minimal personal data—just enough to process transactions securely
- Other Supported Assets: Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Solana (SOL), Polkadot (DOT), Dogecoin (DOGE), TRON (TRX), Chainlink (LINK), Uniswap (UNI), Aave (AAVE), Algorand (ALGO), Tether (USDT), USD Coin (USDC), and many more!

ROBUST SECURITY MEASURES

- Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)

MULTI-CHAIN COMPATIBILITY

- Store and transfer BTC, ETH, BNB Chain, Polygon (MATIC), Solana (SOL), and more

THE MEME ZONE

- Monitor real-time market trends and hype from Pudgy Penguins to the next big thing

Robinhood Wallet - Secure, Seamless, and Built for the Future of Crypto! 

Take full control of your crypto with Robinhood Wallet, the easy-to-use Web3 wallet designed for seamless digital asset management. Whether you're buying, storing, or swapping crypto, Robinhood Wallet empowers you with complete ownership and self-custody of your digital assets. 

Robinhood Wallet offers a non-custodial experience, giving you full control of your private keys while enabling transactions across multiple blockchains. 

▶ Why Choose Robinhood Wallet? 
Robinhood Wallet gives you full control over your digital assets while enabling seamless crypto transactions. Enjoy an intuitive experience built for all crypto users. 

▶ Swap Your Favorite Cryptocurrencies 
Manage and trade tens of thousands of popular cryptocurrencies like Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), USDC, and more. 

▶ Easily Buy BTC & DOGE 
Purchase Bitcoin and Dogecoin directly using Robinhood Connect. 

▶ Supported Networks 
Robinhood Wallet supports multiple blockchain networks, including Ethereum, Solana, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Bitcoin. 

▶ Effortless Crypto Transfers 
Easily transfer crypto between Robinhood Wallet and Robinhood Crypto. Move assets quickly to external wallets on supported networks with no hidden fees (network fees still apply). 

▶ Complete Asset Control 
Send, receive, and store crypto without restrictions. Robinhood Wallet is non-custodial, meaning you have full ownership of your assets. 

▶ NFT Management 
Securely receive and store your digital collectibles on Robinhood Wallet. 

▶ Connect with Robinhood Crypto App 
Seamlessly connect your Robinhood Crypto and Robinhood Wallet accounts with Robinhood Connect. Buy, sell, and transfer assets effortlessly between both platforms. 

▶ Complete Control & Security 
Your private keys remain yours. Biometric authentication and advanced encryption. 

Download Robinhood Wallet today and take full control of your crypto!

Revolut is the money app designed to spend, save, and set money aside.

What's in store:
• Get your own customisable debit card and virtual cards to add to your Apple or Google Wallet (personalisation fees may apply)
• Send money between friends on Revolut (minimum age restriction applies)
• Receive money from everyone — even if they’re not on Revolut — with Payment Links
• Save and earn with a Savings account
• Get a 360º view of your money with Analytics
• If you’re in the UK, you can move to the main app once you turn 16

 
How does it work?
1. Download this app and create an account (if you're below the age of data consent, your parent will need to create an account for you from their Revolut app. You can check the age of data consent in your country below)
2. Get approved by your parent or guardian
3. Choose a debit card and customise it with text, stickers, and your own sketches (personalisation fees may apply), then order it from your parent's app
4. Add your card to Apple or Google Wallet to start spending straight away (minimum age restriction applies)
 
Parents and guardians, this part's for you ↓
With Revolut, they can manage their money independently, under your supervision.
Teens above the age of data consent can sign up themselves, but you'll have access to security controls, like spending notifications, in-app card freezes, and many other features to give you peace of mind.
If you have teens below the age of data consent, you can create an account for them from your Revolut app. Here’s how: 
1. Have them download this app and create an account
2. Approve their account from your Revolut app
3. Order their prepaid debit card from your app (personalisation fees may apply)

Find your country's age of data consent ↓

In Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Gibraltar, Iceland, Latvia, Malta, Norway, Portugal, Singapore, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, or the United States:
• Teens aged 13+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Teens aged 12 or under (minimum age restrictions apply) will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 13+

In Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Italy, Lithuania, or Spain:
• Teens aged 14+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 13 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 14+

In Australia, Czech Republic, Greece, or Slovenia:
• Teens aged 15+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 14 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 15+ (referrals subject to feature availability in your country)

In Croatia, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Romania, or Slovakia:
• Teens aged 16 and above can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those ages 15 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 16+
